contextId.information: "and Aaron was eighty-three years old" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])

"the twenty-first day of the first month." This is near the middle of April on Western calendars. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: the twenty-first day of the month
